layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x98
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x98
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x82
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 202x82 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
        LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {DIV} at (1,1) size 50x50 [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (151,1) size 194x79
          text run at (151,1) width 36: "Some"
          text run at (51,21) width 120: "text that should not"
          text run at (51,41) width 144: "overlap the edge of the"
          text run at (1,61) width 62: "container."
